attributes.review: It took 3 weeks for the app to download. NEXT I WAS SCROLLING THROUGH THE APP AND MY LIGHTS SHUT OFF. I GOT A MESSAGE IN THE MAIL THAT SAID I WAS CURSED. NEXT THING I KNOW IM BEING HAUNTED AND MY HOUSE IS NOW BURNING TO THE GROUND. I just wanted to support my president. This is extremely sad and I DO NOT recommend anybody download this app. THIS APP NEEDS TO BE DELETED!!!! I guess that is what happens when the app is glorifying a pedo, r word-ist, homophobe, and racist!!! 🤢
attributes.title: I AM SO CONFUSED

attributes.review: This has to be one of the worst apps on the app store. Not only was it constantly freezing up but it kept crashing and became virtually unusable. I do not recommend downloading this app to anyone and was a complete waste of time.
attributes.title: Absolutely Awful

attributes.review: This was one of the worst apps that I’ve ever downloaded. It was so annoying and the functions were so slow. I would expect more from the president. It bugged out my iPhone 11 and constantly crashed my phone. Do not get this
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: It’s is very poorly created and impossible to work your way around, I’m embarrassed that the president of the United States a man with tons of power couldn’t even get decent app developers it is quite a shame really also he shouldn’t delete tiktok
attributes.title: Just not a good app

attributes.review: i wanted to see trumps plan as president and when i say i was about to throw up, i was NOT exaggerating. This man is disgusting and has aweful plans for the future. The fact that a rapist got custody of its child and that a rapist in arkansas can now fight for custody is disgusting. This man is absolutely awful. He is a money greedy white supremacist. DO NOT VOTE FOR HIM OR KANYE.
attributes.title: ✨gross✨

attributes.review: worst app I have ever downloaded, it glitches, closes out randomly, and the material on the app is just plain awful. for this reason and this reason only I have collectively decided that i’m gonna give my support to another candidate. I hate you donald trump and gen z rules
attributes.title: this app STINKS

attributes.review: So I was really excited about this app but seems like it only came to disappoint. It kept lagging and when I tried pressing on buttons it was very delayed. Also frick this piece of garbage because I liked tiktok much better
attributes.title: ✨it had potential but ✨nO✨🙂

attributes.review: this app took four days to download, and when opened there was an intentional jump scare of a demented orange that fatally triggered my phobia of citrus fruits. quickly after the jump scare it shut down, then once i got it to open again it had tons of propaganda in support of a racist, misogynistic, rapist. any piece of technology that supports such a fowl cause should be taken off the app store permanently. this is utterly disgusting, i would rate this negative  stars if i was capable to. this is horrible, fowl, disgusting and harmful.
attributes.title: absolutely horrible

attributes.review: I opened the app and I saw a Cheeto... I looked pretty good.... I looked closer and saw orange fungus on top of the Cheeto. It was really disturbing....You know what???? THE CHEETO WAS TALKING..... my eyes has seen enough. But then I gotta see the fattest Cheeto with fungus on top set events. Now that’s wild. Cmon *tiktok lives matter*💪🏽✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿! Don’t download the app if you don’t wanna see what I see🙈!
attributes.title: Orange

attributes.review: As I soon as I went into this app disgusting ads popped up and as soon as I exited out of those it started asking me weird questions like what is the best to eat rats or grasshoppers but the next thing really got me it asked for my address so it could send the animal I picked to my house!.
attributes.title: Ewww gross app
